metadata.title: CVE-2016-0826 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
libcameraservice in mediaserver in Android 4.x before 4.4.4, 5.x before5.1.1 LMY49H, and 6.x before 2016-03-01 does not require use of theICameraService::dump method for a camera service dump, which allowsattackers to gain privileges via a crafted application that directly dumps,as demonstrated by obtaining Signature or SignatureOrSystem access, akainternal bug 26265403.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-0826` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

android - 20160307-0742-0ubuntu3
android-copyright - 20160307-0742-0ubuntu3
android-emulator - 20160307-0742-0ubuntu3
ubuntu-emulator-images - 20160307-0742-0ubuntu3
ubuntu-emulator-runtime - 20160307-0742-0ubuntu3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: android package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '20160307-0742-0ubuntu3').
